body:
### Describe the solution you'd like

See https://github.com/temporalio/features/issues/588

comments.body:
Hi @cretz 

I’d be interested in opening a PR for this issue. Before getting started, I’d like to confirm that the need is still relevant.

It seems that we could rely on the `extra args` option if needed, so we should assess whether it’s really necessary to introduce a dedicated UI option (similar to the one for `dev_server_download_ttl`).

Thanks for your help.

Yes, today users can `dev_server_extra_args=["--ui-port", "12345"]`, so it's not _technically_ necessary, but we have added it as an explicit option in other SDKs like [.NET](https://dotnet.temporal.io/api/Temporalio.Testing.WorkflowEnvironmentStartLocalOptions.html#Temporalio_Testing_WorkflowEnvironmentStartLocalOptions_UIPort) and [Ruby](https://ruby.temporal.io/Temporalio/Testing/WorkflowEnvironment.html#start_local-class_method).

Feel free to open the PR if you need it, or you can use that more manual workaround.

title: [Feature Request] Allow customization of dev server UI port
